about_the_game:
This is an ancient land forsaken by the gods, where the glorious magic civilization has long decayed. Countless magic ruins and ancient relics still disturb this world, causing mysterious events, wild animal madness, monster rampage, and human struggle in this turbulent world.

As a death row inmate, you are given a chance to atone for your sins: sign a pardon and join the suicide squad to quell the disasters across the land, in exchange for your liberty.





Randomly generated dungeons and caves, each adventure is a unique experience, full of surprises and scares. No matter how experienced you are as an "Atoner", monsters can always jump out from unexpected corners.





"Atoners" are ruthless！Blocking, comboing, executing, any enemy that stands in your way to freedom will be annihilated.



Each weapon has its own unique skill, so choose your weapon and upgrade path carefully according to your preference, try different relic combinations and rich options, and you will become a great monster killer.





After dealing with tons of monsters and brilliant puzzles, you will face monster bosses in the depths of the dungeons. They are huge, twisted, and evil, with unique attack patterns and devastating power, they will pose a harsh challenge to your combat skills and strategies.





After the "divine disappearance", the end of the law era, human society collapsed. By exploring this world deeply, you will find fragments of the lost civilization, and gradually piece together the truth behind The Lost Epoch.





In this cruel world, you are lucky to have a place to rest. Here you can craft weapons and equipment, making your exploration journey easier, you can also make various furniture and decorations, making your cottage a cozy haven after bloody battles.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 750Ti, Radeon HD 7850 - at least 1GB GPU memory

Recommended:
  • OS: Windows10

short_description: Saving the world can also lead to wealth! Braves, eliminate all demons, and their dungeons will definitely sell for a good price. Then, replace them with more expensive shining armor and move towards the next dungeon!
